about_the_game:
Sanctumate (Formerly known as Crypt Lord) is an open first-person action RPG designed to give you a quick dose of dungeon crawling adventure, inspired by the Elder Scrolls and King's field franchises.

Prepare to immerse yourself in a dark and mysterious world, brimming with atmosphere and ancient lore as you dive into dark dungeons, collect loot, honor your ancestors, and engage in real-time combat.

Present an offering

Sacrifice items you find to gain reverence, which allows you to increase your skills. This system ties progression directly to item discovery, so you will not be punished for playing how you want to play.

Create your play-style

Discover powerful runes that you can slot into your equipment. Mix and match these runes to create a playstyle that truly fits how you want to play. Effects cover many possible variations, such as teleporting enemies away when you're hit, doing blood damage at nighttime, or allowing you to summon campfires to prepare some food for the adventure ahead. All choices are valid and provide a unique experience.

short_description: A fantasy RPG designed to give you a quick dose of dungeon crawling adventure. Find ancient runes to augment your equipment, allowing you to mix & match magical effects. Delve deep into dungeons, fight demons and monsters, gather loot, and offer sacrifice to your ancestors to increase your strength.
